home.title: TickFlow - Elegant Online Clock
home.subtitle: A clean and beautiful web clock application that makes time display a pleasure.

analog.title: Analog Clock
analog.description: Classic analog clock display with multiple dial styles and smooth hand animations.

digital.title: Digital Clock
digital.description: Clear digital time display with 12/24 hour format switching.

timezone.title: Multiple Timezones
timezone.description: Support for major time zones worldwide, easily view time in different regions.

about.title: About
about.description: TickFlow is an open-source online clock application dedicated to providing an elegant time display experience.

metadata.title: TickFlow - Elegant Clock Application
metadata.description: TickFlow is a feature-rich online clock application offering various clock styles including flip clock, digital clock, analog clock, and more. With real-time display, elegant animations, and responsive design, it brings you the ultimate time experience.
metadata.keywords: online clock,real-time clock,digital clock,flip clock,analog clock,time display,world clock,clock app,TickFlow,在线时钟,实时时钟,数字时钟,翻转时钟,模拟时钟,时间显示,世界时钟,时钟应用

openGraph.title: TickFlow - Elegant Clock Application
openGraph.description: Feature-rich online clock application offering flip clock, digital clock, analog clock and more styles with real-time display and elegant animations

twitter.title: TickFlow - Elegant Clock Application
twitter.description: Feature-rich online clock application with flip clock, digital clock and various styles
